name: ADAL.js
description: The Azure Active Directory Authentication Library (ADAL) enables application developers to authenticate users to cloud or on-premises Active Directory (AD), and obtain tokens for securing API calls.
need: We use the library to sign users into our app and for token handling for secured API calls to both Microsoft and our APIs.
comment: This library uses Azure AD API. v2.0 endpoint is used by MSAL.js library.
